entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 10:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -22.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -28.5°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 13.
